column4: gnome devs changeing things is not a reflection on the ubuntu devs...
unity lens have saved me a lot of time.  hud also saves me time.
Unity was awesome, until it 100% broke alt-tabbing and workspaces. I think this was in 11.04 when they chunked it.

Try maximizing a window in a workspace, with two other small floating applications in an adjacent workspace. Now, you can alt-tab once to switch workspaces! Even better, when you press alt-tab again, you don't get back to your original program, you switch to the third one!
